pkgmetadata.longdescription: Collapsed Latent Position Cluster Model for Social Networks // Markov chain Monte Carlo based inference routines for collapsed latent position cluster models or social networks, which includes searches over the model space (number of clusters in the latent position cluster model). The label switching algorithm used is that of Nobile and Fearnside (2007) doi:10.1007/s11222-006-9014-7 which relies on the algorithm of Carpaneto and Toth (1980) doi:10.1145/355873.355883.
